[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /obj/handlers/inherit/club_personal.c

This is the handler for all things clubby, a club being a group of players. Each club must have a unique name. It also handles elections for various club positions.

Written by Pinkfish

Started Sun Sep 27 03:35:42 EDT 1998

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /obj/handlers/inherit/club_basic.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/am_time.h and /include/clubs.h

Class Index

personal_info
This is for a personal club, a personal club will be removed when the founder disappears.
